title: I wanted to say what happened to my GXL but reply's have been disabled ..... this didn't work....
content:
i did what i read ... i got to the black screen with the primitive navigation. (EXIT / DOS) style. left the phone turned off for at least 10 min. and now its back to the white screen with the google "G" in the center, (with a fast moving load bar under it). 

the last thing i did was make 2 phone calls and left it in the car while i ran into the store .... maybe 10 min. tops. 
 got back to my phone and it was in this condition.


just bought the phone 2 weeks ago, brand new, from a Verizon store. for my company phone Snap-on tools.
